_header: Harken to my ron / As I you tellen can
_description: ‘Le regret de Maximian’ — generally in 12-line stanzas (aabaabccbddb)

BodDig86.First Lines: Herkneþ to mi ronAs hic ou tellen con…
BodDig86.Last Lines:
…Min helde ne me biflitenWel heye I shulde hire
                    honge

BLHar2253.First Lines: Herkne to my ron As ich ou telle con…
BLHar2253.Last Lines: …amen par charite ant so mote hit be
